qas.question: What did Shell announce in April 2010?

answers.text: its intention to divest from downstream business of all African countries except South Africa and Egypt to Vitol and "Helios"

qas.question: What happened in several countries in response to Shell's April 2010 announcement?
In June 2013, Shell announced a review of its operations in which country?
In August 2014, Shell announced it was in the process of doing what?

answers.text: finalizing the sale of its interests in four Nigerian oil fields.

qas.question: What did Shell indicate was a reason for the strategic review of operations in Nigeria?
What did Shell switch from South Africa and Egypt to?
When did protests break out in South Africa?
How many Egyptian fields did Shell sell in 2014?
Where did Shell divest its upstream activities from?
When did the company announce a review of South Africa?

context: Trong <b6_0> Tháng 4 năm 2010 <b6_0/> , Shell đã công bố <a0_0> ý định thoái vốn khỏi hoạt động kinh doanh hạ nguồn của tất cả các nước châu Phi trừ Nam Phi và Ai Cập <b5_0> Vitol và "Helios" <b5_0/><a0_0/> .
